commit.message:
gensupport.c [...]: Change call to alloca to xmalloc.


2001-11-15  Alan Matsuoka  <alanm@redhat.com>

	* gensupport.c	process_include : Change call to alloca to
	xmalloc.

From-SVN: r47062
